ns2:test-suite.name: Factorial
ns2:test-suite.description: As a user I should able calculate factorial number for given number

test-case.name: I test boundary inputs for negative scenarios
test-case.title: I test boundary inputs for negative scenarios

step.name: Given I navigate to "http://qainterview.pythonanywhere.com/"
step.title: Given I navigate to "http://qainterview.pythonanywhere.com/"

step.name: And I enter "01" into input field having id "number"
step.title: And I enter "01" into input field having id "number"

step.name: When I click on element having id "getFactorial"
step.title: When I click on element having id "getFactorial"

step.name: Then I should be able to see element having id as "resultDiv" should have text as "The factorial of 01 is: 1"
step.title: Then I should be able to see element having id as "resultDiv" should have text as "The factorial of 01 is: 1"

step.name: Then I take screenshot
step.title: Then I take screenshot

label.name: story
label.value: I test boundary inputs for negative scenarios

test-case.title: I test boundary inputs for negative scenarios

step.name: Given I navigate to "http://qainterview.pythonanywhere.com/"
step.title: Given I navigate to "http://qainterview.pythonanywhere.com/"

step.name: And I enter "+169" into input field having id "number"
step.title: And I enter "+169" into input field having id "number"

step.name: When I click on element having id "getFactorial"
step.title: When I click on element having id "getFactorial"

step.name: Then I should be able to see element having id as "resultDiv" should have text as "The factorial of +169 is: 4.269068009004705e+304"
step.title: Then I should be able to see element having id as "resultDiv" should have text as "The factorial of +169 is: 4.269068009004705e+304"
